title: Upgrade ANTLR to version 4.5.1
description:
Simple upgrade to ANTLR 4.5.1 which includes numerous bug fixes:
https://github.com/antlr/antlr4/releases/tag/4.5.1

Note this does not change the grammar itself, only small pieces of the generated code.

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content:
Hi Jack, thanks for the update.

My question: You only updated the antlr code generator but not the runtime. Is this intended?

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content: Attached is a new patch that also updates the runtime. All tests pass.

comments.author: Jack Conradson
comments.content: Oops!  Not updating the runtime was a mistake on my part, thank you for taking the time to fix that.
